alert.note: Alert for Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 9:28PM EDT until March 31 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR WESTERN PASSAIC...SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES... At 927 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Beacon to near West Point to near Harriman to near Sloatsburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of western Passaic, southeastern Orange and Rockland Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
